General.Name: DIGITAL CHOSUN Inc
General.Description: DIGITAL CHOSUN Inc. engages in the information processing, outdoor advertising, and Internet content businesses. It is also involved in the school, DB and publishing, and education and culture related activities. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
